channel.title: 2016 on East Back Corporation
channel.description: Recent content in 2016 on East Back Corporation

item.title: Communication service for customer support 'Customer Cast' released
item.description: “Customer Cast”, a communication service for customer support, has been released. “Customer Cast” is a service that provides customer support by video chat and PC screen sharing on the browser.

item.title: Web projection service 'noctiluca' released
item.description: Web projection service “noctiluca” has been released. We recommend using Google Chrome (latest version) and Mozilla FireFox (latest version) on Windows and Mac.

item.title: Sponsored as RubyWorld Conference 2016 sponsor
item.description: As a silver sponsor, “RubyWorld Conference 2016” will be held at Shimane Prefectural Industrial Exchange Center “Kunibiki Messe” on November 3 (Thursday, National Holiday) and 4 (Friday).

item.title: Video chat service 'EB iBoard (β)' released
item.description: EB iBoard (β), a service that enables video chat and text-based communication using a web camera on a browser, has been released.

item.title: Commissioned to operate Ruby Camp 2016 Summer and 2017 Spring from Shimane Prefecture
item.description: On May 23, 2016, we commissioned Shimane Prefecture to operate 2016 summer and 2017 spring. We have been commissioned to operate Ruby training camp since 2011, and this is our sixth year.

item.title: 3D printer sales service 'Make3D' started operation
item.description: On Friday, April 8, 2016, the 3D printer sales service “Make3D” started operation. For the time being, the 3D printer DIY (assembly) kit “Kossel Mini EB” will be sold as the main product.
